page.title: 14A Postman's Day in Hereford.
page.content: My dad is a postman. He usually works in the morning, but one week a month he works in the afternoon. He gets up at 4 a.m. in order to arrive at work at 4.30 a.m. He has a cup of tea and goes to work on his bike or in the car. When he arrives, he usually goes into the{Sorting {Office}and separates the letters and parcels. When the letters have been sorted he puts them in sacks. Some go abroad and the rest are for Britain. He goes across the road to the{Railway Station and puts the sacks on the train. He often goes to Much Birch and delivers the letters. He arrives back at the Sorting Office at 12.30 p.m. and comes home at 1 p.m.
